article_title: “When Will Someone Stand Up To The Executive Branch!?”: @FOXNEWS Dr. Charles Krauthammer On Obama’s Latest Unilateral #ObamaCare Change
article_text:
Yesterday, the Obama Administration decided they would once again rewrite the ObamaCare law and delay the employer mandate. Such a drastic unilateral change by the administration may suggest the President wasn’t joking when he said, “I can do whatever I want”.

Frustrated, Tom asked Dr. Charles Krauthammer, author of New York Times Bestseller “Things That Matter”, how the President is getting away with this and if anyone in Congress will stand up to it!

LISTEN as Dr. Krauthammer explains why he thinks the President’s ObamaCare changes WILL be tossed eventually and the ACA will suffer a slow death…

Audio clip: Listen to audio clip.

CLICK HERE TO FIND MORE FROM “THE TOM SULLIVAN SHOW”
